title: When you tell an Ahri main that Arcade Ahri is coming out soon...

replies.body: DIDNT YOU HEAR TALON IS GETTING A BIG REWORK WITH THE ASSASSINS

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fi2.kym-cdn.com%2Fphotos%2Fimages%2Fnewsfeed%2F000%2F657%2F039%2F7fa.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

I'm torn between the two thoughts of "Must. Not. Care. About. Yorick." and "... Dangit he's right anyway..."

a rework that will be trash




Yeah pretty sure you are one of those guys who QQ's about Talon everyday.  That's why you're happy

... whats that?
ive never seen it before

THERE'S A WHAT!!!

What about another boss skin?
just imagine the arcade kled (like yoshi and mario)
Can still exist, but for now they just made 2 arcade skins. Arcade Corki will also be a thing.

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZzXth_UJDxs/V6TyFZQh0RI/AAAAAAAA9XU/ma0keE8eofoUQr5RpDtcmQ1cjq3HgGxrQCLcB/s1600/2eaaf8b0ae33f1b2.jpg

WELL SHIT! There goes my wallet!

> [{quoted}](name=Ace Access ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=p4nNMe1t,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-08-06T11:59:42.988+0000)
>
> this thread has too many {{item:3070}}s

People are never happy when their main don't have new and/or better skins. :C

{{item:3070}} {{champion:17}} {{item:3070}}
Teemo has plenty of great skins.  Omega Squad comes to mind.

> [{quoted}](name=SlntReaper,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=p4nNMe1t,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2016-08-06T15:17:08.743+0000)

> Teemo has plenty of great skins.  Omega Squad comes to mind.

Never speak of that monstrosity to me ever again.

http://img02.deviantart.net/7c64/i/2015/136/8/2/omega_squad_teemo_by_ichimoral-d8tmmyc.jpg
But look how cool it looks!

> [{quoted}](name=DarkenedAuras,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=p4nNMe1t,comment-id=000a0000000000000001,timestamp=2016-08-06T17:12:17.400+0000)

No... just bloody no!

http://orig14.deviantart.net/8b50/f/2016/090/b/a/teemo_face_4_by_johnnyhedgehog1992-d9x6jen.png
What about Panda? Or astronaut?  They're at least ok.

> [{quoted}](name=SlntReaper,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=p4nNMe1t,comment-id=000a0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-06T15:34:44.562+0000)
>
> What about Panda? Or astronaut?  They're at least ok.

Astronaut has neat effects and panda is a meh.

So far, best of all is Super Teemo because it shows what he should be truly.

I'm fine with that, Not so fine with {{champion:81}} getting one as well. 

 http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/HQNEng5I-arcade-ahri-corki-and-ezreal

He's got plenty of fun themed skins (plus an Ultimate skin that could really use an update). Does he really need an arcade skin  on top of that, JUST cause he looks like he has a power glove in his base skin? Why not give some champs who hardly have any skins the arcade skin?

y u no play on na no more
